title: I Got Covid on a Cruise. I’d Take Another
sub_head: It’s a delightful way to travel, and you can still get sick at home.
body:
St. Petersburg, Fla.
‘Avoid cruise travel, regardless of vaccination status,” the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention warned last week. I took a Thanksgiving cruise with my family—all fully vaccinated—and I got Covid, as did my wife and one of our sons. But I’d gladly cruise again.
